#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
string s;
cin>>s;
int count[52],i,res=0;
for(i=0;i<52;i++)
count[i]=0;
for(i=0;i<s.length();i++)
{
if(s[i]>='a'&&s[i]<='z')
count[s[i]-'a']++;
else
count[s[i]-'A'+26]++;
}
for(i=0;i<52;i++)
{
if(count[i]%2==1)
res+=count[i]/2+1;
else
res+=count[i]/2;
}
cout<<res<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
